name: Never Have I Ever Party
description:
***WARNING: NEVER EVER PLAY THIS GAME WITH YOUR PARENTS!***

Play this classic game with your friends in new fun types of games!

Never Have I Ever™ from QuizStone® turns your device into a social game show with several different types of games and more than 300 ”Never have I ever” statements.

QuizStone® reinvents social & trivia gaming and gives them whole new possibilities. Forget all about your old board games. Now you can bring your favourite game with you anywhere – home to friends & family, at school, to the bar or on the holiday.

What are you waiting for? Put your life experience to the test with QuizStone® Never Have I Ever™!
